dict.acceptation: 重要的；权威的；有势力的；有地位的；

sent.orig: There are three syllables in the word "important".
On program selection, stress shall be placed on the important sectors, important enterprises and important regions.
sent.trans: 在项目选择上，突出重点行业、重点企业、重点地区。

sent.orig: Bribery crime objective important document namely constitution important document, include criminal object and crime objective aspect.
sent.trans: 受贿罪的客观要件即客观的构成要件，包括犯罪客体和犯罪的客观方面。

sent.orig: Service, selection and customer relationships are still important and, in many cases, more important than pricing.
sent.trans: 服务，精选和与顾客的关系还是很重要的，在很多情况下比价格还重要。

sent.orig: The latter is important in Asian markets and anywhere where gesture or character recognition is important.
sent.trans: 支持触笔在亚洲市场很重要，手势和文字识别在哪里都被看重。
